resources.string:
"Lucky Fun" is not just an ordinary game; is a unique and exciting experience, offering three different modes to challenge and place of all ages 

 In the first smart place must haunt the observation skills while trying to find the right colour and on nine options with each level is a difficulty increases which gives player interest and eager to death the visual acuity. 

 The second mode adds an element of adrenaline-fueled excitement express compete against the clock to complete task within a limited period of time quick sinking and quick reaction as essential to success in this fast-paced environment. 

 in the short mode place must rally on their memory and ability to make quick decisions as they identify and select a disappearing colour before it is replaced by nine new options. Smart test memory retention and reaction time to enjoy fast-paced and fun gaming experience.
